results.content:
Served 100% as expected. Please continue with seldom difficult solutions.

no logout function. Initiated with logout() {  localStorage.removeItem('AUTH_TOKEN');  this.router.navigate(['/login']);  this.current_user = {user_name: 'guest'};this.logged_in = false;} from elsewhere. 

Also user_name is undefined without response in navbar.component.ts. Fixed it with if else condition. 

And logged_in is always true even if its false. Fixed it with current_user.user_name == guest and !current_user.user_name == guest in the html template. 

Video quality is extremely bad, downloadable code examples would be handy.

Overall can recommend course and will also order courses from Nevyan Neykov in the future.

response.content: Thank you Andre M. Very good overview and feedback on the course from an experienced programmer side. The course video quality is already improved based on the suggestions. Thank you once again for the constructive feedback - it is appreciated!
response.content_html: Thank you Andre M. Very good overview and feedback on the course from an experienced programmer side. The course video quality is already improved based on the suggestions. Thank you once again for the constructive feedback - it is appreciated!

results.content_html:
Served 100% as expected. Please continue with seldom difficult solutions.

no logout function. Initiated with logout() { localStorage.removeItem('AUTH_TOKEN'); this.router.navigate(['/login']); this.current_user = {user_name: 'guest'};this.logged_in = false;} from elsewhere.

Also user_name is undefined without response in navbar.component.ts. Fixed it with if else condition.

And logged_in is always true even if its false. Fixed it with current_user.user_name == guest and !current_user.user_name == guest in the html template.

Video quality is extremely bad, downloadable code examples would be handy.

Overall can recommend course and will also order courses from Nevyan Neykov in the future.
